mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.xybh AS "xybh", a.nf AS "nf", a.sf AS "sf", a.kl AS "kl", a.pc AS "pc", a.zy AS "zy", a.xz AS "xz", a.zss AS "zss", a.xf AS "xf", a.syxw AS "syxw", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.updatetime AS "updatetime", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_zsjh( owid, xybh, nf, sf, kl, pc, zy, xz, zss, xf, syxw, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10, createtime, creator, creator_name, updatetime, updator, updator_name ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{xybh}, #{nf}, #{sf}, #{kl}, #{pc}, #{zy}, #{xz}, #{zss}, #{xf}, #{syxw}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{updatetime}, #{updator}, #{updatorName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_zsjh SET owid = #{owid}, xybh = #{xybh}, nf = #{nf}, sf = #{sf}, kl = #{kl}, pc = #{pc}, zy = #{zy}, xz = #{xz}, zss = #{zss}, xf = #{xf}, syxw = #{syxw}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, updatetime = #{updatetime}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName} WHERE owid = #{owid}
